Name: Picking Wheat
About the game: A puzzle game in simple visual style. Can you finish all the work in a whole day and get home successfully? Text adventure Some dreamy talk about the hidden diseases in modern society. There are nine visual novel chapters in total. Each chapter describes a theme in different forms. The themes includes the self, emotion, gender, etc. Each chapter is about to cost three minutes. If players are not interested in this part, they can skip it. Puzzle levels Some walking puzzle levels with simple rule. There are nine preset levels in total. Arrow keys control player movement. Each time the player crosses a cube panel, the number displayed on the cube will be reduced by one. After the number of one cube panel is reduced to zero, player can no longer pass through it. Player's goal is to reduce the number of all cube panels to zero and reach the end. If players are not interested in this part, they can skip it. Level editor In addition to the preset puzzle levels, each player can freely create his own level and upload it. This section requires a mouse. At the same time, you can browse all uploaded levels in the level bank, try them, and decide whether you like them.
